short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Reef Chain accounts outside of dapps. Injects the accounts and allows signing transactions for a specific account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reef wallet to create and manage your accounts and interact with dApps on Reef chain. Extension enables decentralised user experience where user manages her/his own keys and no user data is shared or collected.

We can not control reviews below and need to warn you about SCAM numbers and support in reviews. DO NOT SHARE YOUR RECOVERY PHRASE/MNEMONIC/SEED or PRIVATE KEY WITH ANYONE since they can take your funds!
